author: Mariya Petkova
title: Cuba has a history of sending medical teams to nations in crisis
description: Images of Cuban doctors in virus-hit Italy have drawn attention, highlighting a tradition of medical internationalism.
content:
As the world fights to stop COVID-19 claiming more lives, Cuba has dispatched 593 medical workers to 14 countries in their battles against the pandemic, its ministry of public health has said.
One of the first Cuban medical teams was sent to Italy on March 2… [+8917 chars]
